title: Hour 1: Mac of All Trades
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. Smith and Bart Scott preview tonight's Ravens-Buccaneers matchup and debate which team will come out on top. Plus, Aaron Rodgers is still calling out his teammates amidst Green Bay's lackluster season, but is he in the right here? Kyrie Irving and the Brooklyn Nets took another L last night against the Bucks, so our guys are asking the question: What should the Nets do with Ben Simmons? Stephen A. and Bart debate whether or not Bill Belichick is making a mistake by naming Mac Jones the starter over Bailey Zappe for their conference matchup against the Jets.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Who should the Patriots start against the Jets: Mac Jones or Bailey Zappe?
